definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: a moment (NH id.;Targum [[ריגעא]] Ec 9:12: prob. properly a movement, i.e. twinkling, of the eye; cf. momentum, i.e. movimentum);—abs. ´[[ר]]:, [[רָָנַע]] Nu 16:21 +, pl. [[רְגׇעִים]];—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ps 30:6 [[בְּאַפּוֹ]] ´[[ר]]: a moment (passes) in his anger (opp. [[חיים ברחונו]]); Is 54:7 [[קָטׂן]] ´[[בְּר]]: during a little moment

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usu. in adv. phrases:—(a) as adv. acc., (a) Ex 33:5 [[אֶהָד]] ´[[ר]]: for one moment, so ´[[ר]]: alone Is 54:8; repeated Je 18:7, Je 18:9 [[רֶגַע]]…[[רֶגַע]]: at another moment; . . . at another moment; (b) in a moment, suddenly, Ps 6:11 [[יָשׁוּבוּ יֵבשׁוּ רָָגַע]], Je 4:20, Is 47:9, Job 34:20. (b) [[בְּרֶגַע]] in a moment Job 21:13 [[שְׁאוֹל יַחַ֫תּוּ]] ´[[ובר]]: (of a quick and painless death; but see Job 34:20, Ps 73:19: Hoffm Buhl Beer Bu Du [cf. LXX e)n a)napau/sei, Targum [[בְּמַרְגּוֹעָא]]] take [[רֶגַע]] (or rd. [[רְגׂעַ]]) as subst. [√ II. [[רָגַע]]] in tranquility, of a peaceful death). So (c) ´[[כְּמוֹ ר]]: Nu 16:21 = Nu 17:10 [[וַאֲכַלֶּה אֶתֵכֶם כְּרָָגַע]], Ps 73:19. (d) ´[[כְּמוֹ ר]]: La 4:6. (e) [[עֲדֵי רָָגַע]] while a moment lasts Job 20:5. (f) ´[[כִּמְעַט ר]]: like the littleness of a moment = for a little moment Is 26:20, Ezr 9:8. (g) pl. [[לִרְגָעִים]] by moments, at every moment, Is 27:8, Ez Eze 26:16 ´[[וְחָֽרְדוּ ל]]: (so Eze 32:10), Job 7:18 (‖[[לִבְקָרִים ]]).
